### For Maintainers

**Debugging Checklist:**
- [ ] Check recent protobuf update PRs
- [ ] Verify buf.lock is up to date
- [ ] Regenerate protobuf code locally
- [ ] Run protobuf CI workflow
- [ ] Check for breaking changes in upstream definitions
